column5: English
column11: English

column5: Hey, /p!
column11: Hey, /p.

column4: ついに、この日が来たな。
column5: The day's finally here.
column11: The day is finally here.

column4:
今日は、/pが初めて
マリオネーションギアに乗る
日だ。
column5: Today's the day you'll get to try your hand at piloting a Marionation Gear.
column11: Today's the day you'll get to try your hand at piloting a Marionation Gear.

column4: 心の準備はできてるか？
column5: You ready for this?
column11: Have you prepared yourself?

column4: もしかしてビビってる？
column5: You're not chickening out, are you?
column11: You're not chickening out, are you?

column5: Yeah...
column11: Yeah...

column5: Not at all.
column11: Not at all.

column4:
ま、はじめてコクピットに
座るんだ。
無理もないよな。
column5: Well, let's start with getting you in the cockpit. That shouldn't be too much to ask for...
column11: Well, let's start with you sitting in the cockpit. That shouldn't be too much to ask for...

column4: こっちの準備はできてるぜ。
column5: Everything's been set up.
column11: Everything's been set up.

column5: Thought you might say that.
column11: Thought you might say that.

column4: こっちの準備もできてるぜ。
column5: Everything's been set up.
column11: Everything's been set up.

column4:
整備は完璧。
秘密のギミックもつけといた。
column5: My repair work's flawless, naturally. I added a secret trick, too...
column11: The repair work I did is flawless, naturally. I also added a secret gimmick.

column4:
これが/pの
マリオネーションギア
/c5人形騎士ゴッドフリードＧ４/c3だ。
column5: This is your Marionation Gear, the /c5Puppet Knight Godfried G4/c3.
column11: This is your Marionation Gear, the /c5Knight Mech, Godfried G4/c3.

column4:
世界初の巨大人形
“ゴッドフリード”は
知ってるよな？
column5: You know about {Godfried}, the first-ever gigantic puppet, right?
column11: You know the first ever gigantic puppet was a 'Godfried', right?

column4:
全長２０メートルの巨体で
５１歩も歩いて、集まった人を
驚かせた。
column5: Its giant 20-meter frame managed to walk 51 steps, astounding the people gathered to see it.
column11: With a large frame over 20 metres tall, it managed to walk 51 steps and astounded those who had come to see it.

column4:
これは、その後継機の
後継機の後継機。
column5: This here is the fourth generation of that Puppet.
column11: And this here is fourth generation of that puppet.

column4:
人形騎士の元祖ともいうべき
歴史的な一品だ。
column5: Based on the original Puppet Knight -- it's a real piece of history!
column11: Based on the original Knight Mech, it's a real piece of history.

column4:
まあ、つまり……
博物館クラスの旧型ってことだ。
column5:
Or rather... 
It's so old-fashioned it belongs in a museum.
column11:
Well, that is to say... 
It's so old-fashioned that it belongs in a museum.

column4:
あと十年もすれば骨董品
としての価値がでそうな
感じだな……。
column5: After more than a decade in service, this thing's probably classified as an antique...
column11: With more than a decade of service, this thing is probably classed as an antique...

column4: ポンコツもいいとこだ。
column5: {Piece of junk} is a fair description too...
column11: “Piece of junk” is a fair description too...

column4:
ま、
いつか最新型のすげぇ人形を
手に入れるとして……
column5: Well, someday we'll get to work with the latest high-tech Puppets...
column11: Well, someday we'll get to work with the latest pieces of high tech...

column4: 今は、こいつで我慢してくれ。
column5: For now, you'll just have to put up with this thing.
column11: For now, you'll just have to put up with it.

column4: さあ！　乗ってみろよ！
column5: C'mon, get in!
column11: Go on, climb aboard!

column4:
コクピットから
天井が見えるだろ。
column5: You should be able to see the ceiling from the cockpit.
column11: You should be able to see the ceiling from the cockpit.

column4:
ゴッドフリードが仰向けに
なってるから、コクピットも
上を向いているわけだ。
column5: Since Godfried's on its back, the cockpit's facing upwards.
column11: Since Godfried is on its back, the cockpit is facing upwards.

column5: How's your position feel?
column11: How's that position feel?

column5: All right.
column11: All right.

column5: This angle's kinda...
column11: This angle's kinda...

column5: Sweet.
column11: Sweet.

column4: ちょっとだけ我慢してくれ。
column5: Just bear with it for a sec.
column11: Bear with it a little longer.

column5: Right, let's fire it up.
column11: Right, let's fire it up.

column4:
マリオネーションギアは
操縦者の指紋を記憶する。
column5: Marionation Gear use fingerprint recognition technology.
column11: Marionation Gear uses fingerprint recognition technology.

column4:
だから、本人以外は
動かせないってわけだ。
column5: So, only their own pilots can activate them.
column11: So, only the pilot himself can activate it.

column4:
ゴッドフリードには、
/pの指紋を
記憶させてある。
column5: Godfried's been keyed to your fingerprint, /p.
column11: Godfried is set to your fingerprint, /p.

column4:
コクピットのわきに、
指先の形をしたパネルが
あるだろ。
column5: In the cockpit, you'll see a screen with a fingertip on it.
column11: On the control panel, you'll see a screen with a fingertip on it.

column4:
それが/c5指紋認証パネル/c3だ。
指先をパネルに押し付けるんだ。
column5: That's the /c5fingerprint scanner/c3. Press your fingertip against the panel.
column11: That's the /c5fingerprint scanner/c3. Press your fingertip against the panel.

column4:
そのまま確認が終わるまで
指を離すなよ。
column5: Don't take your finger off until it's finished the scan.
column11: Don't take your finger off until it's finished the scan.

column4:
/p本人と認められれば、
ゴッドフリードが起動するぜ。
column5: If Godfried recognizes you, it'll start up.
column11: If Godfried's recognised you, it'll start up.

column4:
立ちあがった！
成功だ！
column5:
It started!
SCORE!
column11: It started! Score!

column4:
次はゲートを開けるんだ。
右の/c5赤いボタン/c3を押してみろ。
column5: Now you need to open up the gate. Hit the /c5red button/c3 on the right.
column11: Now you need to open up the gate. Hit the /c5red button/c3 on the right.

column4:
/c5十字ボタン/c3で
ゴッドフリードが歩く。
column5: Use the /c5D-Pad/c3 to make Godfried walk.
column11: Use the /c5D-Pad/c3 to make Godfried walk.

column4:
十字ボタンを/c5素早く２回
入れる/c3と高速ステップだ。
column5: Tap the D-Pad /c5twice rapidly/c3 to do a Quick Step.
column11: Tap the D-Pad /c5twice rapidly/c3 to do a Quick Step.

column4:
よし、格納庫を出てみろ。
いざ太陽のもとへ。
column5: Okay, time to leave the hangar. Head toward the daylight!
column11: Right, time to leave the hangar. Head towards the daylight.
